title: Ticket #4333: Make new release of Bosco
description:
A new Bosco release is required due to a change in the authentication protocol between the submit host and the remote cluster submit node.

As a brain dump, the steps required:

  1. Put a new build of Condor in the bosco FTP server: ftp://ftp.cs.wisc.edu/condor/bosco/
  2. Update the bosco_findplatform URL for the new bosco binary.
  3. Add new builds for Debian 7 and Ubuntu, and add to bosco_findplatform
  4. Bump release version.
remarks:
2014-May-30 14:03:40 by jfrey:
HTCondor 8.2.0 will be BOSCO 1.2.3.

2020-Jul-13 13:01:02 by blin:
Presumably this ticket can be closed?
creator: dweitzel
